Health.headline: Child obesity reaches ‘alarmingly high’ levels in Europe, WHO warns
Health.summary: The World Health Organization (WHO) has issued a warning that child obesity has reached "alarmingly high" levels across Europe. This public health crisis calls for urgent interventions and policy changes to promote healthier lifestyles among children.
key_points: WHO warns of "alarmingly high" child obesity in Europe.
Calls for urgent interventions and policy changes.
Promotes healthier lifestyles among children.

Health.headline: Study: Radiation may not help survival for some breast cancer patients
Health.summary: A study suggests that radiation therapy may not improve survival rates for certain breast cancer patients, challenging conventional treatment approaches. This research could lead to more personalized treatment plans, reducing unnecessary interventions for some individuals.
key_points: Study suggests radiation may not improve survival for some breast cancer patients.
Challenges conventional treatment approaches.
Could lead to more personalized treatment plans.

Health.headline: Rate of drug-resistant blood infections to rise in Europe through 2030
Health.summary: Experts predict that the rate of drug-resistant blood infections will continue to rise in Europe through 2030, posing a serious public health threat. This highlights the urgent need for new antimicrobial strategies and responsible antibiotic use to combat growing resistance.
key_points: Drug-resistant blood infections predicted to rise in Europe through 2030.
Poses serious public health threat.
Highlights need for new antimicrobial strategies.
